sql.name: tsdsmyformsunpage_city
sql.item: select c801800001 as 受理地市 from {100} order by c801842006

sql.name: tsdsmyformsunpage_type
sql.item: select distinct ye.a from (select distinct(type.c801800002)as a, type.c801800007 as b from {100} type where type.c801800001='投诉' ) ye

sql.name: tsdsmyformsunpage_qudao
sql.item: select t.C630000018 as name ,t.C630000030 as id from {100} t where t.C630000021='2' and ((t.C630000018 like '%分公司%') or (t.C630000018 like '%区客服%') or (t.C630000018 like '%河北移动%'))
